transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji sir, good evening. Main baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se relationship manager. Kaise hain sir?
Customer: Woh aawaz aapki clear nahi aa rahi hai sir.
Executive: Haan ji, abhi abhi abhi saaf hai sir? Abhi clear hai?
Customer: Haan. Hello. Haan ji. Main IndiaMART se baat kar raha hun sir, relationship manager. Mera naam hai Alok Kumar. Toh main jaanna chahta tha abhi aapne call kiya tha sir customer care mein?
Customer: Mein. Toh main jaanna chahta tha sir kya concern tha sir aapka?
Customer: Darwaza band karke aawaz lena. Haan.
Executive: Ji ji sir. Aapne call kiya tha na sir customer care mein toh bataiye na.
Customer: Haan call kiya tha. Maine maximizer liya tha April mahine mein.
Executive: Ji ji April mein aapke service mein.
Customer: Haan toh uska mujhe benefit kuch nahi ho raha hai toh mujhe band karwana hai service aur mera mera paisa refund karwa do.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Sir dekhiye, pehli baat toh kya hai ki benefit kyun nahi ho pa raha hai?
Customer: Kyun nahi ho pa raha hai jo main jo jo chhoti moti buyleads mujhe aa rahi hai, badi buyleads jaise consume karne jaata hun woh dusre ko sold out ho jaati hai. Within one session mein kaise sold out ho jaati hai? Iska matlab aap kaise karte ho aapko jo paisa zyada de raha hai usko aap automatically leads forward karte ho aise.
Customer: Haan toh mujhe woh kuch benefit nahi ho raha hai na. Chhote mote kab tak main karte hue toh hun. Maine IndiaMART isliye toh liya hai ki mujhe business bada karna hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aap bech rahe ho mujhe laakhon ke customer mere ja rahe hain aur aap mujhe hazaron mein khilwa rahe ho.
Executive: Sir, sir.
Customer: Is wajah se mujhe woh maine dekha hai pichle saal bhi main renew nahi karne wala tha. Tabhi bhi aapke koi account manager hai koi woh Nitish Nitish karke hai aur jo unko madam thi unhone karwaya lekin uska benefit nahi ho raha hai mujhe sir.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Toh chhe mahine se dekh raha hun dekh raha hun dekh raha hun kar raha hun toh nahi ho raha hai aur main woh consume hi nahi karta hun chhoti moti main consume nahi karna chahta sir.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aisa hai. Sir abhi abhi main yeh jaanna chahta tha ki abhi aap aap hi sara kuch handle karte hain ya koi staff wagera bhi hai aapke paas sir?
Customer: Staff bhi hai na. Uske liye maine sir alag se IndiaMART ke liye ek employee rakha hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Woh khali ko IndiaMART ka hi woh dekhenge aur dusra ek hai mera woh dekhenge.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Toh usme bhi jaise hi buyleads aati hai consume karne jao toh turant chali jaati hai. Click karne ki fursat hai khali. Kabhi bhi nahi milti hai toh kuch dikkat nahi hai na. Kuch kuch problem nahi hoti hai.
Executive: Sir abhi main baat kar raha hun na ki abhi reason kya hai. Pehle aapki main baat karun ki yeh samajh lijiye ki last year ki main baat kar raha hun. Pehle IndiaMART jo tha option deta tha ki ek buylead ko maximum 10 ya 11 supplier buy kar sakte the sir.
Customer: Haan. Us time is time hum log 10 ya 11 option dete the toh usme hamare supplier ka yahi feedback rehta tha ki sir IndiaMART toh saari ek hi lead ko jo hai saare supplier ko bhej deta hai sir. Saare customer ko bhej deta hai ki usme customer phone bhi nahi uthata hai.
Customer: Woh toh samajh mein aaya na. Woh samajh mein aaya ek buylead aap maximizer mein chhe logon ko bechte ho ya 11 logon ko bechte ho. Haan toh suppose abhi abhi ek aapki aapne buyleads ka jo dal di toh maine consume kar li toh consume nahi hoti hai toh ek second ke andar maine jaise hi aapke click ho jaata hai tabhi bhi consume nahi kar paata hun toh uska theek hai at least 10 buyleads mein ek chaar toh milni chahiye kya do toh milni chahiye ek bhi nahi mil raha hai. Toh kya fayda phir aisa?
Customer: 10 buyleads mein se ek bhi nahi mil raha hai toh kya fayda hoga hamara?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir buyleads toh abhi bhi agar jab main check karun buyleads toh abhi bhi aapne buy ki hai sir isme. Abhi.
Customer: Are woh chhoti chhoti chhoti chhoti haan chhoti chhoti buyleads hai wohi bol raha hun na main. Chhoti chhoti buyleads main consume kar pa raha hun jo badi orders rehti hai uska consume nahi kar pa raha hun wohi bola na maine mere jo laakhon ki deal rehti hai woh nahi mil rahi hai hazaron mein deliver ho rahi hai sir.
Executive: Sir yeh bol raha hun main. Dekhiye is is is ek hi solution hai sir. Theek hai? Aapko jo person aake yahan pe hire kiya hua hai IndiaMART mein aap unko ki woh regular basis pe us wale jo IndiaMART ka buyleads wale page ko refresh kare. Refresh karenge toh jaise hi nayi lead generate hogi turant ke turant woh buy kar lenge toh woh automatically buy ho jayegi.
Customer: Haan woh sab bol diya woh Nitish ji ne aur Ankita madam ji hai unhone sab unko online yeh bhi bata diya kaise karna hai kaise waise hi karte hain woh.
Executive: Ji. Sir abhi ki main baat karun toh khali 55% ka hi hai aapki jo pichle mahine ka October mein jo hai woh 77% aap fresh buyleads purchase ki thi. Abhi November mahine mein 57% aapka average chal raha hai jo fresh buyleads hai.
Customer: Haan wohi bola na maine maine unko haan suno na suno na maine unko bola tha ki chhoti moti buyleads consume nahi karni hai mujhe chhoti moti woh buyleads nahi chahiye.
Executive: Ji. Isliye woh nahi hua hai. Aise hai. Hmm.
Executive: Sir dekhiye iska solution. Sir abhi kal toh kal kal do buyleads aayi thi main main khud tha laptop pe kal do buyleads aayi thi maine dono bhi consume kar li within one second ke andar andar woh hua hoga lekin woh bhi consume nahi kar paya. Usi time maine woh Nitish ko phone lagaya toh woh bola maine chhod diya hai main abhi IndiaMART mein nahi hun. Toh phir woh maine kya bolun abhi unko?
Executive: Sir main keh raha hun. Customer: Toh maine bola ki baba mujhe nahi mujhe abhi woh service aage nahi karwani hai sir. Ab ab dikkat yeh hai na ki sir main ab ek baat boliye sir ab iska solution koi cheez ko band karna toh kisi cheez ka solution nahi ho sakta hai na sir. Ab mujhe chahiye nahi maine aapko jitna paisa diya hai na maine idhar agent logon ko diya toh woh mujhe bhar bhar ke customer laake dete hain.
Executive: Sir agent bhi toh market se leke aaye hain na sir customer ye. Customer: Market se leke aaye chahe woh samne toh laake bithaate hain agar ho nahi ho apne haath mein hai deal lekin samne toh laake bithaate ho aur jab samne laake bithaate ho toh 90% mein crack kar leta hun deal waise nahi hai mera. Kuch log hote hain ki nahi hota hai woh toh sabka hi hota hoga. Aise hai.
Executive: Abhi bhi abhi bhi jo hai is mahine abhi total jo hai aapke liye 250 jo lead use hui hai November mahine mein saat buylead aapne buy ki hai sir jisme paanch din aapki team active hui hai lekin total 13 dinon mein paanch din hum logon ne lead uthai hai sir. Sir main keh raha hun dekhiye aapka jo product hai jis jis product ki aapki costing hai 50-60 hazaar se chhota koi bhi product nahi hai sir aapka. Theek hai.
Customer: Wohi bol raha hun 50-60 hazaar ke niche nahi hai mera. Haan starting hi 40,000 ke upar chalu hota hai.
Executive: Sir main main wohi keh raha hun ki jo aapka product hai agar jo main baat karun package aapne kitne saal ke liye liya hai 1,10,683 plus GST mein theek hai. Hmmm. Kal ki jo costing jo aapne diya tha humne IndiaMART ko woh aapka 1,10,683 aapne payment kiya tha sir IndiaMART ko. Theek hai agar jo usko main 36 mahine se divide karta hun toh mahine ka aapka costing aa raha hai 3,000 ka sir. Theek hai aur din ka costing aata hai aapka yaani ki jo 100 ke hai. Theek hai 100 ke hisab se.
Customer: Woh sab kya woh sab aap batao mat sir woh toh mujhe malum hai woh toh calculation simple ho gaya lekin lekin aap aap woh sab aapko hamara paisa dala hua nikal gaya toh ho gaya. Khali one two lakh kamao aur ghar mein baithu kya main? Sir main yeh yeh cheez ke liye main kahan keh raha hun ki aap ek ya do lakh. Phir aap wohi bata rahe hain na ki baba aapne 1,83,000 dala hai toh six per month ke hisab se 3,000 aapka ho gaya per day ke hisab se woh 100 rupees ho gaya. Hmm. Woh aisa calculation woh mujhe aap kyun bata rahe ho mujhe business nahi mil raha hai woh baat kar raha hun na main. Bata raha hun jo abhi aap boliye hai na ki main refund le leta hun main refund refund ka koi solution nahi hai na sir refund kisne bola. Kyun nahi hai kyun nahi hai hona chahiye aap agar aapke aapke bataye is pe aap nahi reh rahe toh aapko refund karna padega na. Sir refund ka issue koi nahi hai toh koi sabke yahan hota hai sabke yahan hota hai refund ka issue. Refund nahi hota aise ho hi nahi sakta. Phir aap kya lootne baithe ho kya customer ko? Sir aap ek baat bataiye mera main concern yeh hai ki aapko solution chahiye refund chahiye do cheeze hai isme aapke. Refund nahi mujhe permanent main abhi kam se kam chaar saal se IndiaMART pe hun sir mujhe bahut. Solution ki nahi karenge sir. Haan? Ki aapko solution solution chahiye toh solution yeh hai ki bhai aapko apne ladke ko bolna padega ki woh actively buylead ko buy kare. Jab woh buy kaise karu bhai nahi ho raha hai toh aap batao na buy kaise karu kya abhi ek second ke andar kaise karu main usko buy click karne mein 30 second 30 second bhi nahi 30 minute yeh jaata hai na ek second ke andar bhi click karta hun toh usme bhi buylead consume nahi ho paati toh kya karu main? Sir woh ek second ke andar bhi paanch log click kar denge na aapse pehle toh woh automatically. Ab phir wohi ho raha hai main kya bolun chhe mahine se main chhe mahine se try kar raha hun sir. Chhe mahine mein ek bhi maine badi buylead consume nahi kar paya. Hmm. Toh iska matlab wohi hua na ki baba aap jo zyada paise dete hain unko hi aap buyleads provide karte ho aisa hota hai woh. Aaj ki date mein aapne AI laga ke rakha hoga ya automatic unko buylead consume hoti hogi. Sir jo feature aapne unko diya hoga. Haan. Aisa hi hai sir aisa hota hi hai. Nahi woh toh mujhe abhi kya karu aap mujhe refund ka karwa do sir mujhe nahi mujhe IndiaMART mein abhi nahi rehna hai sir. Bahut bahut ho gaya mera abhi yeh. Aapki product line mein hamare paas jo aaj ki date mein 20-20 lakh de rahe hain na woh 20 lakh ke liye bhi same hi condition jo aapke liye hai sir condition. Waise phir phir aap kya karte ho mere mere mere mujhe jo condition aa rahi hai 20 lakh dene wale ko bhi wohi condition aa rahi hai toh aap udhar baith ke kya karte ho phir? Haan toh main wohi toh wohi toh keh raha hun na sir toh woh toh market ka khel hai sir. Bhai jo aaj ki date mein jo jo zyada jitna zyada active rahega woh usko fayda milega sir. Abhi kya abhi kitna active rahu rahu main aap hi batao mujhe kitna active rahu. Nahi nahi toh sir main yahi keh raha hun ki ek toh main iska solution yeh hai ek toh jo bhi ladka aapka buylead buy kar raha hai main auto refreshment wale tool main unko jo hai download karwa deta hun usse keh rahe hain ki woh baar baar jaise woh baar baar click karte hain na yeh refreshment karne ke liye woh baar baar click mouse se click karna padta hai toh woh cheeze problem start ho jayegi. Jitni zyada fresh buylead dekhegi utni jaldi woh jaldi consume kar payenge. Kisi cheez ka solution yeh hai ki bhai abhi aapne jitna bhi buylead buy kiya hai woh gini chuni city se hi aap buylead buy kar rahe hain sir. Toh jitna zyada preferred main keh raha hun ki abhi jo aapke jin city se aap buylead buy kar rahe ho na abhi jo aapka consumption ka pattern hai sir woh chaar paanch city hi aapki as a preferred city bani hai sir. Wohi toh mujhe lene bola tha maine jab maximizer liya tha maine bola tha mujhe Gujarat, Maharashtra, Karnataka aur Goa yeh chaar chaar state mein hi mujhe business karna hai kyunki woh mere territory mein utna hi aata hai main all India nahi kar sakta. Main as a distributor kaam karta hun. Theek hai distributor ship hai. Haan jab meri territory hogi us pe hi kaam karunga na main all India toh kar nahi sakta. Samajh gaye samajh gaye sir Kolhapur, Pune, yeh Belgaum, Sangli, Vijayapura, Hubli yahi abhi aapki city as a preferred cities bani hui hai sir. Haan Goa ki toh mujhe aaya nahi aayi hi nahi rahi hai buyleads usme. Ab ab main wohi wohi cheez toh main aapko bata raha hun sir ek toh sabse pehle jo abhi aapka ladka woh kar rahe hain buyleads toh woh wahan pe jo filter laga ke woh kar hi raha hai aisa toh hai nahi ki bhai nayi lead ka woh kar raha hai. Ab wahan pe aisa nahi hai hume aapse koi aisi dushmani nahi hai ki ya toh aap aisa kijiye ki aap apni team ke sath kal aap ek dum mein sir video meeting pe aaiye ya. Nahi pehle toh pehle jaise aati thi waise buyleads abhi nahi aa rahi hai na pehle toh maine maximizer bhi nahi liya tha only TrustSeal liya tha usme toh mujhe business milta hi tha. Abhi ek saal se mujhe business hi nahi mil raha toh kya karu main? Sir main keh raha hun ki main aadhe ghante aapke sath baithta hun online aapki team ke sath theek hai video meeting pe hum log same time pe refresh karenge tab aap dekhna ki us time aapko kitni lead dekhegi ya lead milegi sir. Aisa nahi hai agar jo koi banda kya nahi nahi hota sir woh sab woh pehle bhi pehle bhi woh sikhaya woh waise sab dikhaya pehle theek hai dekhta hun karke bola main toh toh ek aath din hota hai baad mein phir se waise hi hota hai. Sir main tabhi toh keh raha hun woh usme abhi abhi aapki jo activity dikha na abhi jaise paanch din ab mahine ke jo chalenge kitne din chalenge aaj 13 din chalenge na 13 din mein keval paanch din aapki team mein buylead use hui hai sir. Toh ab aap jo hai business ka toh daily ke daily requirement hai na sir. Business toh hume daily ke daily requirement hai. Kya requirement hai nahi mujhe agar chhe mahine mein ek do buyleads nahi mil rahi hai toh main woh leke kya karu woh batao na. Chhe mahine kya main yeh nahi bol raha ki baba ek mahina hua hai mujhe ek mahine mein 30 buyleads chahiye ya 10 buyleads mujhe milna hi chahiye aise toh nahi bol raha hun chhe mahine mein ek do buyleads nahi milte toh uska matlab kya hoga sir? Sir main tabhi toh buyleads toh hum log aapko dikha rahe hain main wohi usi point pe aa raha hun sir. Aapko thoda sa market ke hisab se thoda sa aur thoda sa clever hona padega thoda sa aur zyada active hona padega tab aap us cheez ka fayda utha kya sir usko abhi 24 ghante employees ko 24 ghanton mein baithaun kya laptop pe? Sir 24 ghante nahi 12 12 ghanta baithta hai subah 9 subah 9 baje aata hai sham ko 9 baje jaata hai. Ab main woh jitne bhi ghante mein baith raha hai na main kal kal main ek baar subah subah 9:30 10 baje aa jaunga. Abhi subah aaj aaj subah se khali teen buyleads aayi hai. Main keh raha hun main kal kal unke sath ek ghante video meeting mein rehta hun sir aap bhi us time aana theek hai phir main us time aapko dikhata hun ki woh kitne subah se leke kitne lead utha sakte hain sir. Abhi khali bolne ka bhi main aapko samne hi practical karke dikhaunga ki woh us time theek hai theek hai sir kal mujhe 10:30 baje call kare. Theek hai kal 10:30 baje main call lagata hun aapko tab us time dekhte hain sir isko theek hai aap nishchint raho sir aapki problem hamari problem hai sir. Theek hai nahi nahi woh abhi last call hai sir yeh yeh is pe nahi solution nikla toh mujhe refund karwa dena sir. Sir uske liye abhi bahut ho gaya sir main abhi teen saal toh teen saal wait nahi kar sakta iske liye. Aise kya aapke bharose rakhunga toh main diwal kar ho jaunga diwal kar ho jaunga. Aisa nahi aise hote nahi. Theek hai koi nahi main kal ek baar.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting enough quality buyleads.

- Wants refund for the subscription.

- Feels current subscription is not beneficial.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about buyleads system.

- Executive offered a video meeting to resolve issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call next day at 10:30 AM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription, maximizer
